resources.string: Choose the character and tap it to make it move
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt magna aliqua.
I am the power that rules your life. But truly i have only one place. I’m inside you
I will always move forward, step by step. It doesn\'t matter what I meet on my way.
I am lying on an invisible base from my experiense and memories. it will never let me fall down
I am reaching for the stars to reach my dreams, to touch it and make it shine bright
I am made of childish fears. Keep me safe and always remember you can overcome everything
I am watching on everything i left behind. It used to be real, but now it’s all gone
I am weak now. But I\'ll get my strength back soon and continue on my way
I am taking off my old bandages. All my wounds are now healed
I am catching the drops of new impressions. I’m ready to get something fresh
